content.detailedDescription:
i was talking with a resident where i work in front of address 22300 devonshire street in chatsworth. about 2235 hours i noticed three floating orbs ascending north west of my position, as i attempted to get this residents attention, a fourth object appeared over the mountains. as both resident and myself in awe with what we witnessed, i snapped a series of photos. the first time i witnessed these objects in the sky was 3-15-2013 i have two videos of the same kind of object. 

    at first, i thought to could have been paper hot air balloon, but i would see these objects take the same flight path. it also seems to glow or burn much brighter than a paper hot air balloon. these glowing orbs seemed to follow a flight pattern and path. the objects would float then disintegrate around the same area as the first. these objects made me feel unsettled, gave me goosebumps, and filled with mixed emotions. prior to them disappearing i was in awe. the objects disintegrated over the street lamps. the other witness took notice that no air craft were seen at the time of event, we witnessed a police helicopter before and after the incident. we have two air ports near by, van nuys, burbank, and further down lax. which jet traffic was magically not around during the event 


    with the pictures attached it seems artifacts are seen near the top of the photo. imag0301 and imag0305 have artifacts. with each picture captured, i verified what i was seeing to what was captured on the phone. those two objects at the top of those pictures were not seen by the other witness or myself.

info: a body of water is around where the objects could have been floating over.
content.summary: Four glowing orbs floating in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving north with my kids and we noticed lights low in the sky about fifth teen in total traveling west. at first i thought they were chinese lanterns but that night we had a strong wind about 20 knots from the west i don't think the lanterns can go against that strong of a wind field. the first row of lights about ten in total crossed our vision in about one minute in a v formation four or five more followed but in no formation. the traffic around us begun to slow down and looking at the objects. they were pulsating and red in color and did not change direction. the sighting lasted a total of two minutes and the objects were heading towards the everglades. i handed my son my phone and he was able to capture two photos of the last object we saw.
content.summary: About 15 red lights heading in a west direction

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my pourch looling up at north star .And it look like a star  sudenely took off acrouss the deep space ..It was just like a star.And it only took 5 seconds to go across the whole sky...I not sure if i sawit desent i was going to get my cell but it was to fast ..Besides my brain couldnt beleave what it was watching..I just want someone to conferm that iam not going crazy..Iam going to get a camera tonite if its clear
content.summary: Big brite..White lite like star stopped than take only 5 second to go out of site..Itwas in space.To hi 4 planes

content.detailedDescription:
Estava no carro quando vi um objeto com luzes vermelha de uma lado e azul de outro lado o objeto vazia v��rias manobras tinha v��rias pessoas observando o objeto o objeto n��o vazia nenhum barulho vazia manobras estava muito pr��ximo ao ch��o. o objeto em seguida desapareceu.
o objeto n��o vazia barulho estava a poucos metros do ch��o o mesmo se deslocava e ficava pairando.
eu j�� testemunhei v��rios objetos mais esse �� o primeiro que estou enviando para a mufon

content.locationName: Passo Fundo, Rio Grande do Sul

content.detailedDescription:
It was the evening of a law school exam finals.  well it didnt appear i had much of a law school future so i was stressed out and had a drink, one drink.  i finally was going to be and all of the sudden i could not move in my bed i was physically frozen.  then a light came on outside on the patio and the large brass platter above my bed was shaking and buzzing like a speaker.  i had the curtain closed on the patio doors so all i saw was a bright light.  then all of the sudden there 6 grey aliens standing around my bed. they seemed to be like a hologram projection of them.  they said to me i was a leader and that they would help me in the future or i would help them in any case there would be more contact. then they dissipated and the platter was still buzzing as they went away and the light lifted slowly at first then fast they platter buzzed for quite a few minutes till it faded away as they left.

i remember being on their ships in what seemed like dreams several times before that with them sticking probes into my side and things like that i never felt threatened.  i started craving protein and my health improved noticeably.

then i seemed to have a relationship with them when i would pray with my native pipe they would come and show up face to face in dreams and say hi.

when something major was going on like my cabin burned down in minnesota they came face to face again.  

i was involved with native american spiritual ceremonies and pursuing virtues as a spiritual path.  i think telepathic greys use and pursue virtues because if you know what the other guy is thinking you have to also high technology requires virtues.

i have two fantastic children i got thru ceremony bridge and keegan they greys came to me one day in a dream and said to me "how do you like your genetically engineered children" they are amazing beautiful emotionally well balanced straight a kids. the leaders of tomorrow.

then i had a whopper vision dream well it seemed very real for sure not a dream.   i over came a bunch of shamanic obstacles in a dream call them fears challenges or whatever, dream work if you will.  then all of the sudden i was on a ship.  in a bed room there were other young people there. you were allowed one possession a guitar skateboard whatever.  you could picture your room any way you wanted it and it was like a holograph it would appear in that form pretty cool. 

then i was invited on to the bridge of the ship. you cold see thru the windows the stars passing by. there were several greys standing at control panels in front of the windows.  there was a captains chair and in it was the queen alien if you will.  she was noticeably bigger than the other ones.  she said come here and i sat on her lap. she said to me "you must of gone thru quite a lot to get this far".  "put you thoughts into the swirling orb of rainbows.  there was rainbow ball of energy floating in the room that controlled the ship and the future.  so i put my thoughts into the orb.  then she said "i love you " and i was back in my room.

i haven't any contact recently but expect them back soon. 
in trust honesty and truth...In its purest form...
content.summary: I was visited by grew aliens that came into my bedroom and told me that i was a person they would use as a keader ubn the future it has led to another major experience where i was invited on their ships.  i have been worked on by them on their ships

content.detailedDescription:
i have had two sightings in my life, the first one was around 1999, or 2000 while driving near the state fair grounds in raleigh nc, it was a box shape craft, there were multiple cars behind me,and i was driving maybe 7 to 10 mph, no one was blowing there horn, i could assume we were watching the object pace our cars, it continued to pace us, and at the red light, it stopped with with us, and hovered" and started to rotate and show lights" red, green, red green, in a straight line, no noise, from the object, until it started to rotate sounded like gears, then no noise, it flew right over my car,and shot straight up to the heavens, i felt very nervous, and scared.

 2nd sighting was april 26, 2014,  i and my wife were driving in raleigh when we noticed lighted objects, i will call them large orbs/lights,some the size of volkswagen cars,  i counted over 30 flying around in random directions, over buildings, over the hospital, over the roadways, the orbs/objects were reflecting off the passing vehicles, you could see the objects lights reflecting off the bushes, and trees, after 15 minutes of these orbs/objects flying around randomly they all flew towards the parking lot, and flew straight up towards the sky, within 2 seconds they were gone. during this time, i did witness a raleigh policeman, look and then drive off, i tried to get his attention, but he never looked at me.
content.summary: Multiple orbs/objects flying randomly 15 min in raleigh nc

content.detailedDescription: 23 may 2014 as my son and i were walking stella the dog by the river yare, and having sat down on the seat over looking the river situated south of bland road, norwich, norfolk, uk, we were commenting on the fighter jets roaring above our heads at great height. they looked very small when out of the white clouds. i said they were not playing war games but chasing a ufo radar contact for i knew from previous experiences how to tell the difference. we watched a fighter plane go into a great pulled about fluffy white cloud that was unlike the other clouds and i said to my son to watch for a ufo to come out of the other end of it. there was a short gap between that cloud and the next and as we watched it a craft of huge size materialized within the gap. it was not moving but just hovering. it was in shape hard to describe as it seemed that the outer edge was not so visible but it was long like a cigar and light metallic green in colour with two bars or rails running along ether side underneath that shone a brighter metallic green. after around ten seconds or so it dematerialized and a jet fighter came out of the cloud, which was tiny like a fly in comparison to the ufo. we could hear the jets after burners and see them at times going extremely fast, then slow right down and turn as if trying to find it once again. i got the impression that the ufo was kind of playing games with them. the time of the sighting was 14:20 and the craft was almost overhead and slightly to the east. i have watched something like this now three times from or near my home, and over the twenty years i have lived here i have seen a good few sightings. once one has seen them it becomes habit to keep an eye on the sky and to learn how to look. i am sure the raf would just say what they always say, that they were just playing war games or practicing. however all three times i have seen these happenings it was over built up areas and the flying was frantic. i���m afraid that i did not have the time or togetherness to get my phone out and take a video or photo, for if i had tried to do that i would have missed the sighing. next time perhaps!
content.summary: The outer edge was not so visible but it was long like a cigar and light metallic green in colour with two bars or rails running along ether side underneath that shone a brighter metallic green

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my porch watching to meteor shower, had gone out several times tonight looking to see if i could watch the show (not much there), when a light caught my eye from way west and as i watched it from first sighting approximately the nine o'clock point and approximately 45 degrees off the ground it was also about 15 degrees off my due left, so i could see it was not coming straight at me. there where not one light flashing so i knew right off it was not a plane and moving at the speed it was there was no way it could be anyway, it traveled from almost due west right over my head at this point it was about 85 degrees over head and had gone from 9 o'clock the 12 o'clock in about 40 to 60 seconds , and continued on at this speed until it was at the 2 /2:30 , 3 o'clock point just up and left of the quarter moon, at which it just was gone. no flash ,no anything ,just disappeared , not sure if it continued or not as the moon was starting to wash out the sky making it look a little milky from the sun glow adding to the milky-ness of the sky.

on first sight i knew it was not a meteor as there was not trail and that it was not a plane because there where no lights blinking it glowed a steady color , which i am going with white center with a slight reddish ring round it. as it came over head there i could see it as a yellowish white with a red tone to the outer 'ring".

i know we are not alone , and have seen "different things " several times in my life, but this was a wow moment that got me writing this, it sent chills down my back the hair on my arms was on end and i got chill bumps.
the whole thing was so fast i did not have time to get any pictures or video of it which really ticked me off ,, the whole sighting was like 2 minutes long , it moved that fast.
content.summary: Was watching the meteor shower when seen it go across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I'm here today to share my personal experience with sightings/visitations of ufo related instances. a couple of years ago when i still lived in humboldt county, northern ca, i randomly had a string of dreams that were all different variations of me looking up in the sky, seeing a black ufo looking object and then i become shocked/overwhelmed with sleep paralysis.(a frozen like state where i'm aware of my surroundings, yet paralyzed without mobility and with total fear.) to say the least, the first time it happened, maybe 2ish in the morning, i looked up saw a black object, shimmering with multiple layers of metallic blackness and im struck with paralysis, my eyes in the dream become closed, my body is fetal up and i hear a booming jet engine like humming resonating in the backroom. the noise had a metallic sound almost like i was in a different room at this time. all i remember after that moment was pleading to myself, in my head, yelling please don't hurt me, please don't hurt me, please don't hurt me. i then slowly drifted asleep, like you would if you were tranquilized only to wake up in my bed clinching to my girlfriend in fear, waking her frantically telling her my experience. she was so confused that it really didn't impact her much, so i layed scared to go back to sleep. i had 2 different dreams like this one in different variations, i wont go too much into detail so i can carry onto my real-life sightings that all occurred within a 2-3 month period. but the second dream was of a cigar ufo in the distance that ended up flashing 3 consecutive lights, starting from right, middle, then left and then i was again put into paralysis, but that time much slower, not as instantaneous as the first time, and to this day i still have dreams where ufos are in the sky and they basically haunt me, but moving on. 

im outside one night taking my dog out to go do his business, and it was right when i got home from work, still wearing shirt and tie and all. as i take him to my side yard, i lean on my trucks front end, lean up and look at the sky. (im a huge star gazer, i can gaze for hours!) and this night struck me because it was so amazingly clear, a truly crisp night to stare at stars. as i stare in delight because its not overcast for once, i notice something catch my eye, moving from right to left. at first i thought i saw a flock of birds, because they come quite often overhead. so as a take a second glance my eyes focus on a perfect equilateral triangle that was cloaked/almost invisible, with the tip pointing to the left zooming across the sky. and the crazy part about it is that the only reason i noticed the object was because the triangle was blacker than the nights sky. the sky seemed like it was a greyish bluish black tint, and this thing was full on blacked out. i basically saw a black silhouette, with no lights and no sound. (the second time i saw this same exact triangle on a different night maybe a few weeks later, the black triangle, same shape and color, moving in a slightly different direction had 3 lights on each tip of the black triangle. and the third and last time i saw this exact same craft, on a different night soon after, the black triangle had no lights on the tips, but it had a faint but distinguishable light was emanating from within and showed through multiple vents that lined the bottom of the triangle. it was the fist time it wasn't completely cloaked!) these sightings all spooked the hell out of me, but also awakened me to the total awesomeness of the unknown that lurks in our deep space. one other notable sighting i saw, which was my first sighting and it happened maybe months before these black triangle sighting, it was my very first sighting that i couldn't explain. it was basically a star looking object that moved like a satellite, but was much bigger. as it moved across the sky and i gained notice, it blinks, then disappeared, and reappeared more to the right as it stayed in a consistent motion. it blink and disappeared a second time, then the third time it reappeared it flashed a light, that lit of a small blip in the sky, but it was 25-50 times bigger than the initial star like light. my last sighting was where i live now, in the bay area in ca. i was out, taking my dog out, again lol, and i looked up and saw 4 stars all in unison, spread out like a boomerang, moving slowly over my apt complex. it moved slow and looked almost cartoony. it makes me gasp in shock and smile in fear every time. i hope it stays positive and doesn't escalate, but so far it been benign and feels like a type of spiritual awakening to the truth.

i do fear the dreams where i now fear looking up because of the paralysis that comes with it, but a part of me thinks that it may be some sort of message or even an invitation to open my brain further. maybe all i'm supposed to do is let go and accept the paralysis. i've read stuff and have practiced astral projections and o.B.E.S. maybe that's why i'm having these experiences. i don't know. but if anyone else has had similar experiences. please share them with me, i would love to hear your story.
content.summary: First multiple dreams of ufo induced sleep paralysis, then multiple sightings of a cloaked black triangle zooming over my house at night, once when summoned. still have constant dreams of ufo sightings

content.detailedDescription:
Laying in bed, bright white light filled room, woke me up.Thaught helicopter was hovering outside window.Knew that was impossible too many trees outside window. at the time i was lighting director at school, so i know about light entensity and distance, then the light turned red from window. it saturated the room like a fog. then i sat up on the side of the bed. looking at this red light that filled the room.Something was not right i know this was no ordnary light.
suddenly the door to my room started to open slowly, about 3/4. then three aliens stood there.Two short ones 4 ft each, another 5 ft between them.I said to my self.. oh aliens.. i wasent afraid except i was not expecting them.They stood there for a moment then the larger one started moving her fingers to instruct the other two.I just knew the larger one was female.She was the boss.
  now i just started remembering this like 20 years ago. im 54 now. i was a teenager at the time.So then the nurse i found out later said they wanted to take me in ther craft and examine me.( non talking )i said where is your space ship ans she replied back there. (that was in the woodsbehind  my house)i asked her if they would take me for a ride. she said we 'll have to see. this has been comming in bits and pieces over the years,and its not like any of the cases i've seen on tv on my reaction.
 so then i remember floating down the hall to the kitchen to these two little windows above the sink and i remember thinking im never gonna fit through them. the next thing i could see the ship hovering about 50 ft above ground with the hatch open, white light emmiting from it, and green red lights on both sides, blinking i think.
  then im on the table,( it was real dark ) i love dark rooms and it was warm too like being back stage so i liked it. the nurse alien was standing there to my left middle of tje table and i asked her her name,she told me  i cant remember now but it 
 wasent exotic.I said is this gonna hurt and of cource she said no,it wont take long then you can go home.Then all of a sudden she backed up fast. and this other alien ( the doctor came in, she was affraid of this guy.He took my left arm and started to stick some big !! needle in it.Then i started to scream, they i became restrained, i think they put some big ass probe up my nose, it was long too.And hurt beyond any pain i could tell the doctor was pissed off, like he had enough of these stupid humans screaming and doing the job in general. i ve herd that these greys have no imotion but they do, this guy got really mad at me for screaming and calling the nurse to help me, she split afraid of the doctor and was somewhere in the backround, he was pulling and sticking me harder and harder everytime i yelled and screamed.. like take that !!You stupid human
 finally he threw down my arm in discust like working on a car engine and nothing is going right to fix it..He gave up !! this doctor was powerful and you could feel the energy he admitted, it almost made you feel sick being neer him.The next thing i remember i was wandering around the table from a distance maybe 10 feet, they were working on another person now. i yelled for my friend the nurse and she appeared from the darkness, i went to grab her like a baby to his mommy.. and six of the alien workers on the operating table put down there tools to come and get me, like a animal got loose. i went over to the nurse and hugged her, they just stoped.. in there tracks an stared at me holding on to my friend the nurse.They were startled as though they had never seed a human hug a grey, it really suprised them and they kind of looked at each other,she put her hand around my head and said its ok, the doctors went right back to work like nothing happened,she left me alone for a few minutes and i walked around. not one of the doctors paid any attention to me, like i was one of the family.Ok so then i said to the nurse what about my ride.She braught me into a room with one guy, like working on an old telegraph bord plugging in wires to different holes.She said he was very busy but would ask
  the next thing i knew we were up around 10000 ft looking strait down like the bottom of the craft was transparent, the entire landscape was lit as if it were daylight( it was 3 or 4 at night )crystal clear..Next thing i knew i was sitting up in bed, i went to sleep and forgot about it for what 30 years.Sounds wild right..I sware thats the truth !!
content.summary: Two exterior lights  door open under lower half

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking in the north for meteors, when i turned south and saw three bright objects in a triangle shape within a few degrees of each other. i was perplexed, as i could not identify these stars. the didn't twinkle, so i figured one was a planet, but i knew the planets there at that point. by the time i realized that these were not stars, they were dimming as if they passed into the shadow of the earth, or like an iridium flare satellite dimming.

these were, if i remember correctly, in the bottom left corner of ophiucus/serpens cauda. they were within 3 degrees of each other. i did not see a shape within these lights, only the lights.

i went online to check to see which satellites these were so i could brag about it, but upon checking online databases of satellite passes, nothing matches up. these went out at the exact same time. conversely, a satellite i perceived in the northern sky and assumed was the iss did turn out to be the iss.

i hope someone else reported this, as i'd like to determine what's gone on here.
content.summary: Saw three lights where they shouldn't be slowly fade out, like a satellite passing into the earth's shadow. these were not on satellite trackers.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside watching what i expected to be a great meteor shower, however only saw a few 'shooting stars'. i then came back into my house just to double check the area that i should be looking at was polaris. i used the star app i have on my phone to find it in the night sky. as i moved my phone toward polaris from north to south a light image caught my attention. it was a orange/yellow fuzzy in texture appearing to be a ball of fire. i just figured that it could be a comet but i am unsure. i then tracked the object as it headed south-east towards toronto area. i lost sight of it after a few minutes. it was moving quite slowly and it also appeared to be semi if not within our atmosphere. it took roughly 5 - 10 minutes for me to lose complete sight of the object.
content.summary: Appeared to be a comet. orange fuzzy fireball.

content.detailedDescription:
I am really bad and don't know much about degrees or inches/feet, nswe or anything like that, so i did a really bad job filling out the thing for a report..

this happened a couple of hours ago.. it was nighttime.. the street lights pollute the sky a little bit.. i was outside listening to coast to coast am waiting for the meteor shower.. i was looking for meteors, and that's when i saw this disk shape object "glide" by in the sky.. it just, glided, so smoothly.. it was nuts.. 

it was obviously a solid object.. 


i guess you could say that it was a disk.. i say disk and circle, because i don't think that there is a big difference? it didn't look like it had a room sticking out of the top of it. and, there were no windows or anything that i could see..
 but it was thick.


this was my first ufo experience ever! it looked like a metallic color, a dirty, dark, metallic color, but it wasn't reflective.. not that i could tell anyway.. it wasn't as big as i expected a ufo to be.. it wasn't huge or anything..

 it was about as high as if you would stack two normal sized trees on top of one another facing up. that's about how high it was.. 

it flew over one of the buildings here, and a couple of trees next to the buildings, and of course there were power lines around.. i am not crazy! this is the most "real" thing that i have ever seen!.. it looked so 3d, too.. it looked so real yet it 'seemed' "unreal".. it's hard to explain, i was in shock..Shock. i had a great view of it, too..

it went by in a perfectly straight line.. smoothly.

 i could tell that it was "thick" it was not really "flat".. i had a huge panic attack after i saw it.. when i saw it at first. i just kind of sat there and stared..

 i guess that i saw it for a few seconds, but those seconds seemed like minutes when it happened.. it did not shoot across the sky like a shooting star. it moved slower than that, but it was still fast.. it was slow enough for me to realize that it was thick, and a dark dirty metallic color, i guess.. it was obvious in the sky... 

it stood out like a sore thumb. there was no sound. no lights. it was very smooth. i just sat there and stared until it disappeared into the distance. as soon as it was gone i grabbed my lawn chair and went to the front door as fast as i could.. i had a panic attack for like an hour.. i was trembling, shaking.. i just can't believe it..

 i have never seen a ufo until now... i was actually afraid to post this.. i was debating about it for a while. that's why i am not going to give out my name or exact location.. i still need to process this.. i am not going back outside to see the shower.. screw that! i have attached a picture/description of what i saw.. i can't draw, though, lol. but hopefully you will get it.

i don't think that i am going to be able to sleep tonight. lol.
content.summary: Circle/disk object right over my building while i was sitting in the lot

content.detailedDescription: 11:30 pm, 5-18-14. i went outside on the back porch. the sky was clear, there was unlimited visibility. i looked to my left towards the western sky and observered a constellation that looked like a backwards question mark. it was about 20 degrees of elevation at the bottom reaching up to 30 degrees at the top of it in the sky. i thought to myself how much this resembeled the big dipper to some degree but there was no star at the end of the constellation pointing away from the southern most star (map direction) to make a scoop. then, the star at the southern most part( map direction pov) at the bottom of the formation which had the same brightness and intensity as the other stars in the group moved away towards the right in a straight horizontal line. it quickly dimmed out while moving at a slow constant speed and heading in about 3 seconds and dissapeared. i was a bit unnerverd by this. i did some research and identiified this constellation as leo. the "star" that moved and winked out was sitting there at the end of the formation.
content.summary: While observing a constellation, a star sitting stationary within the formation moved from a static positiion to the right and dimmed out wiithin 3 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 1:30am on 5\24\14 i noticed a bright orange object in the sky it was stationary i thought maybe it was mars upon observing the object i noticed a white flash just below and to the right if you would have blinked you would have missed it i then observed about five minutes later another white flash and another 5 minutes after that for a total of 3 flashes each one moving closer and closer to the orange object  about 20 minutes or so later the orange object disappeared not exactly sure what they were but thought it warranted further investigation the direction was 245 degrees west southwest of my current location as per the compass on my phone
content.summary: Bright orange star like object stationary. smaller white object white in appearance flashed bright 3 times

content.detailedDescription: Was at a park with my girlfriend talking, noticed a super bright orange ball. thought maybe a plane. was very large, a solid orange glow like a fireball. we watched it glide across the clear sky without a sound.  saw planes fly by before and after,  like any normal plane with white and blinking lights. this was much bigger.  there is also a meteor shower tonight but flew across the entire sky unlike any meteor i've seen before. we both watched it the entire time. it started to get smaller and almost looked as if it went up into some clouds that i could not see because of the darkness. neither of us had seen anything like it before and have seen plenty of meteors, planes, helicopters, etc.
content.summary: Large orange flaming ball gliding silent across clear sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving work walking out to the parking lot to get in my vehicle. i was walking with a co-worker. 
as i was walking with the co-worker i said to him, " look at all the cemtrails today" he responded they are nothing. 
as we got to my vehicle i was watching one cemtrail that all of a sudden split and then continued moving south. 

as i was watching the split that is when i noticed the object at the  split of the chemtrail. 
the object was at the first split not the continuing cemtrail.

what made me notice the object? it was visible to the eye. i then pointed the object to my co-worker.

could not tell what the object was. was not a balloon, to square. it was hovering, it was windy that day the object was not moving all around. the cemtrail planes are very small to the eye, this object was very noticeable 

the object was tall and was shaped like a rectangle. it was white on one side and it appeared to rotate and gray on the other side. it rotated very slow. 

my feeling were neutral, i always notice cemtrails, but this was the first to see a break in the trail and see an object. it was very cool.

never lost sight of the object. watched it for about 15 minutes, got in my truck and drove home. 


thank you
content.summary: Was watching cemtrails many on that day noticed one from north to south break in trail object at break cemtrail continued

content.detailedDescription: I was at the park flying my remote controlled airplane with the hope of capturing another ufo "i asked the ufos to show up" on film and it looks like i got what i asked for... i recorded several this time. when i was flying my plane i also noticed 2 flashes of light in the sky next to my plane i said to my girlfriend did you see that? she said no. but i could tell it was something because they looked like a streak of glimmering light both times. so when i got home i reviewed the video and noticed several different ufos and something that looks like a wormhole but i don't know for sure. i have uploaded enhanced versions of the videos to you tube but here are the originals.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Recorded from my remote controlled airplane

content.detailedDescription: A buddy of mine, who wants nothing to do with this, & i were back in desolation valley east of big pine helping my uncle with his mine. sleeping outside, we were laying on backs just talking. i noticed a triangular set of 3 lights moving rapidly above in sky. i pointed it out & we watched it move across the sky thinking it was a plane. suddenly, the 3 lights separated & went every which way? the lights not only separated but in split seconds could change directions at 30 degree angles, maybe tighter? they played around like that for several minutes, then came back together into the original triangle shape & continued on out of sight. i know of no plane, even today, that can do that. i never said much about this because i did not know about this reporting service till just recently. no video, they didn't have that stuff then.
content.summary: Extremely high flyover

content.detailedDescription: Watching for meteors from tonight's meteor shower.  the very prominent colors were brighter than surrounding stars and airplanes in the area. i thought it was a star but colors were too unusual. it seemed as if the object was slowing going away, like flying more north and not "setting" as surrounding stars were. over a period of minutes, i noticed the lights were much smaller and dimmer. again, it was like it was moving north on a parallel plane, not as a star moves. but the movement was gradual.  the object eventually got very small and i returned to the house to make this report.
content.summary: Thought it was a star but colors were different from neighboring stars.

content.detailedDescription: Multiple times over 6 months, on clear nights, i have witnessed a similar anomaly. a bright white light traveling in a straight path high above ground, plane like initially but silent (live in a very quiet area 20 mi south of rdu so planes are common) makes an ascent seemingly out of orbit rather than continuing on its path. the light is at a distance where if a plane, it would be quite visible for several minutes in a straight line path before going out of sight. light is steady; no blinking, but fades with ascent. possible a bright object (asteroid?) moving closely past earth before quickly passing out of sight.
content.summary: Bright white light ascending out of orbit.

content.detailedDescription: I was grilling some burgers on he grill in my driveway and heard a jet flying overhr=ead.  i live about 10 mikes from the local airport. i saw yje jet fly by with all beacons flashing and then behind it i saw about 20 orange lights scattered around the sky that were moving about the same speed as the jet.  i did see at least one o the objects drop to an elevation where the sun was not reflecyo=ing off of it and it looked more like a sphere or saucer shape against the still light sky.  i called out my daughter, her boyfriend amd my wife after the main sighting and they witnessed 2 more of the objects flying overhead about 4 minutes after thr main group came over.
content.summary: Was outside grilling, looked up at jet flying over and saw numerous objects following and reflecting setting sunlight.

content.detailedDescription: On way to store, saw first set of glowing orange orbs in shape of a triangle.  just to north of it was another set in a triangle , then to north of it was a square-they all 3 were in a row.  i stopped in road and asked another person in car if they saw, and they said yes.  they thought it was hot air balloons.  but they were in perfect formation.  i drove about 30 seconds to turn car around and they had disappeared.  just gone!  i am pretty shook up by this. have called festus police and radio station and neither had reports of this sighting!
content.summary: 2 sets of orange orbs in triangles, one set in sqare

content.detailedDescription: At home. looking at the ocean at night. orange/yellow light in the sky caught my atention. immediately noticed that it was not a plane/helicopter. i saw the light for 20 seconds and ran inside to call my parents to see it. when we got back outside it wasn't there anymore. it was moving in one direction, faster than an airplane, but it was still supposed to be visible when we got outside, considering it's speed. i see planes and helicopters everyday and i'm sure it was something else.
content.summary: Orange/yellow light. for sure not a plane or helicopter. silent. moved faster than a plane. but not to fast. static light.

content.detailedDescription:
In june of 1975, i and a friend went to my sisters for a bbq. we left her house at midnight. taking the 91 freeway home, my friend drove and i rested my head on the window of the passenger seat and fell asleep. i was awakened by a voice that said to look out the window. i thought it was my friend speaking to me. i said "what?" she said,"i didn't say anything." confused by what i heard, i turned my head to look, and i saw a red ball outside my window. it looked to me to be about the size of a tennis ball or somewhat larger. i thought it was a reflection coming from something in the car or possibly a power pole reflector light, or one of those poles with reflectors on them, as there was a light plane airport in the vicinity.

after scanning the area, i saw there were no power poles and none for planes either. examining the inside of the car, there was no reflections coming from anything. i asked my friend to speed up... the ball stayed with us. i asked her to slow down, the ball was still there. she thought i was crazy and asked me what i was doing. she didn't see the ball at first. i asked her to pull over on the shoulder. she did. we got out of the car and the ball was about 30 feet away from us...Not moving. she asked me what it was. i had no idea. we got back in the car and this time...I drove. i pulled out into the slow lane and drove on for a minute or two. i looked again and saw the ball was now gone. i decided it had to be a reflection from something i just didn't notice at the moment. 

after about ten minutes, i saw what i thought was a car coming straight for us in the oncoming lane. looking at it, i decided it was just glare from night driving. i thought it was oncoming traffic, coming around the bend by the mountains and it just looked like it was in my lane. saturday night traffic was heavy, and i tried to change lanes to avoid an accident, just in case i was wrong and it was heading straight for us. i couldn't change without hitting someone else. there was traffic on both sides of me, in front of me and behind. if i slammed on the brakes, there would be a rear-end collision and the people behind me could get killed, so i took my foot off the gas and the brake altogether. 

 i braced for a head-on collision. i reached over to put my arm in front of my friend to try to shield her and raised my legs up to the steering wheel, hoping the wheel wouldn't crush my chest. closing my eyes, i knew we were going to probably get badly hurt or killed. after a few seconds of waiting for the crash, nothing happened. i opened my eyes and saw that the car in my lane wasn't a car at all. it was in front and above my car. i saw clearly it was a air craft unlike anything i had ever seen. 

it was huge. at least 2 football fields in length or more. the front of it was a horseshue shape with a blueish, purpleish hue around it. it looked like an enormous bumper like you would see on a bumper car at the fairgrounds. it was that shape and the hue around it was moving, pulsing. i leaned forward towards the dash and looked out the window, to see it clearer and so did my friend. glancing into the rearview mirror, i saw there was no one on the freeway. no one. not in front or behind or to the side of me. mysteriously, what was seconds before a crowded freeway, all three lanes were empty except for me. i opened the door and got out. there was no sound, not one. quiet. this craft glided over my car silently. i watched it glide down the freeway until it was gone. 

for some reason, i began to feel panic. i was frightened out of my mind. i stepped on the gas and sped home. when i got there, i looked at the horizon from my balcony. i wondered why it looked like the sun was coming up, as i left the bbq at midnight and lived not an hour away. i looked at the clock. it was five thirty in the morning. i was momentarily confused by that, but then, never gave it another thought. my friend and i drew what we saw on napkins. the images were identical. 

the next morning, i woke up sick. so was my friend. she was depressed and cried all day. she said she didn't know what was wrong with her. she was confused and miserable. i told her i was sick too, and that was not like either of us. 

two neighbors came to visit. i told them what happened the night before. they thought it would be great fun to go to the same place, again, that night. i was scared and didnt want to go, but i gave in and we went. we left after dinner. at weir canyon road on the 91 freeway, we saw at least fifty cars hugging the shoulder up against the mountains. eveyone was out of their cars and watching the sky. we did the same thing. it was about eight at night, and the sky was full of red balls, darting in and out, from side to side, up and down, thousands of them. they were chasing each other. all of a sudden, a huge white light snapped on from high in the sky and the whole crowd gasped. it snapped on and snapped off several times, just like a lightbulb the size of an football arena.  

we watched this light show for about an hour and then i drove all over riverside that night, looking for anything that would tell me what that was. asking at a gas station, a helicopter, a huge one, completely white; looking like a twelve passenger helicopter, no markings, blacked out windows except for the pilots window, came over the freeway and almost down on top of my car. the wind from the blades was blowing dust and debree into my eyes. march airforce base was close by, and i figured it was from there. it left and went down the freeway. i could see the pilot. he had what looked like a military helmet and goggles on. i knew something was terribly wrong. somehow i just knew they had followed me to the gas station at the bottom of the freeway at weir canyon road. we were all scared and decided to leave right away and go home.

almost immediately, i was not able to walk normally. my neck was stiff and i couldnt straighten my head. my walking gait was like i was under the influence of something. i couldnt concentrate. my eyes burned and my tastebuds no longer worked. i could taste nothing. the company i worked for which made computer printers, called me into the office and asked me if i had a  drinking problem as i was stumbling around the plant. 

i knew i couldn't tell them i saw a ufo and now i something was wrong with me. they fired me over time, saying i needed alcohol treatment. when i told them i didnt drink at all and never used drugs, they didnt believe me. i lost my job. as a result, i lost my apartment, my car, everything i had in life. i could no longer remember how to drive or do the work i had done for years. i had major panic attacks daily and nightmares.  

it took three years of massive medications and doctors visits to begin to walk normally and to be able to think again. i am ok now, and have attended college and am the senior rabbi of temple beth sinai in hemet california, yet, even now, i have to think carefully how to start my car and at times, i have no memory of where i am. i have lived in hemet for years and know this town like the back of my hand, but still get lost anyway. at times, nothing looks familiar to me and i dont know where i am. during these times, i have learned to not panic. i just sit quietly and calm down. in a few minutes, it passes and i'm alright again.  

it was at least five years later, when recalling this incident to a group of friends that i realized that when the craft went over my car, i had not shut off the engine, i had just put it in park, yet, i had to start it when i got back in the car. i realized at that moment i had the radio on that night, but when i left, it wasn't on. i realized i had no memory of many things that obviously  happened that night. 

since then, i have been obsessed with ufo's. i have watched every documentary made on the subject, trying to find anything that was like what i saw that night. i am driven by it. i've been everywhere trying to find an answer. area 51, rachel neveda, everywhere. i've talked to everyone and anyone who has seen something they can't explain. i have tried to find anyone who was out on the freeway that night with no success. i have no pictures or video to send you. in 1975, i had no such gagets. 

this incident took three years out of my life with no explainable illness that the doctors could find except one...They said my autonomic nervous system was blown out by something. they asked me where i had been and what i had been doing. i could not tell them what really happened for fear they would send me to a hospital for the mentally handicapped. i have been urged by close friends to have regression therapy and have considered it, but the idea of it frightens me beyond belief, for reasons unknown to me. i'm afraid of what might be there. i don't know why i'm afraid, i just am. 

i'm looking for some kind of help, someone who can explain this to me, give me some answers, to hopefully end this obsession with ufo's.
content.summary: 2 sightings on same freeway on consecutive nights. on first night, i lost time. went back second night saw thousands of red orbs

content.detailedDescription: My granddaughter and i were taking out a bag of garbage to put in the can out by the road.  when we got out to the road i got the feeling we were being watched and all the hair stood up all over my body like electricity saturating the air.  my reaction was to turn around and look.  i don't know why i reacted that way because my husband was asleep in the house.  when i turned around i observed a heavy cloud bank pretty low in the sky, but otherwise the rest of the sky was clear.  as i was scanning around the yard to see if anyone was there, i observed an orb coming down through the cloud bank at quite a fast rate, but then it slowed down to a crawl and continued on a steady path toward us coming from the wooded area and moving in a straight line up my property going from west to east.  i was so alarmed i told my granddaughter i needed to get the neighbor and in haste took off running and my granddaughter was grabbing my nightgown trying to keep up with me.  i yelled through my neighbors back door and told him to come outside and look at this thing.  he was in the basement and came outside with his wife and she was holding their child.  by that time the sphere was in between our yards going in the easterly direction still, but when his wife looked up she got scared and ran in the house with their child and slammed the door and locked it and shut off the lights.  he looked up too and had his cell phone in his hand and it totally died and he fell backward really fast on his back.  it looked like he was attacked and pushed over really fast.  i ran under it to see if there was some sort of mechanics to it thinking it may be some sort of remote controlled device,  but there was no opening.  it looked like there was heat or some sort of glowing in it but it wasn't a chinese paper lantern, it wasn't ball lightening, it couldn't have been a remote or radio controlled device because there wasn't anyone around that was staying with it to see it.  it was a beautiful sphere with oranges and reds swirrling around inside.  it was the most beautiful color i have ever seen.  my neighbor had to leave for work soon because he worked the graveyard shift, and my grandchild and i came in and we woke up my husband and told him what happened.  he said if i report it  nobody will believe us.   the next evening my neighbors brother came to visit him with his girlfriend from detroit.  they camped outside in the backyard and was looking up at the stars and the same thing happened to them.  the girlfriend got so scared as to what they were seeing that she demanded he take her back to detroit where she lived.  she said she doesn't like the country and camping.  almost immediately my neighbor who was knocked on his back when he saw the sphere,  started having terrible headaches.  they moved and within months he  was diagnosed with a brain tumor and had surgery to remove it.  his wife had a nervous breakdown after months of psychological problems.  my grandchild and i who both had asthma prior to the incident, started having daily asthma attacks that progressively became chronic to the point we both had to start using a nebulizer machine to help us breathe.  as i thought about this more and more it dawned on me that i had seen the same looking sphere 6 months prior to this sighting.  it was in january the same year, and was traveling in the same easterly direction only north of us.  it was at night because it was dark, but i don't recall the time.  i was upstairs in my room sleeping and for some reason i woke up and went to my sliding doors to look outside.  i could see it pretty well back then because my trees weren't as tall as they are now.  i told my husband the next morning and he asked me, "who ya going to tell?"
content.summary: Observed swirling orb glowing reddish orange.

content.detailedDescription: Came out of my bank, got in my truck, after i put the key in the ignition i looked out the windshield in time to see a disk type ufo move between lower hanging clouds (very cloudy day). looked for about five minutes but did not see it again. the disk was gold in color, flat on the bottom, straight sides at about thirty degrees tilt in and a thin spindle on top. the first time i saw a ufo i was ten years old, i have seen many more though the years since then, this is the first gold one. this is the first time i have reported a sighting.
content.summary: Sitting in my truck, looked up at the right time.

content.detailedDescription: Well, my girlfriend and i see them most nights of the week. there appears to be many consistencies in there behavior. the high altitude ones commonly appear to dive in and out of the atmosphere, you will see them flying by at a high rate(much faster than planes, satellites, or any other "known" craft. the flight characteristics are incredible. there is little light pollution where i live, and at over 5000ft altitude we have a near perfect view of the sky, we see many meteors, there is a lot of airplane traffic, so its busy up there and you can see everything. i have noticed many anomalies over the years here, i have always been highly intrigued. these last few months have been night after night with these things. the most significant experience happen about a week ago. slow moving, venus sized object, couldn't have been more than a mile up, felt closer. moving almost directly above me, i have never felt fear in any of my experiences, but this began to unnerve me. out of some uncomfortable feeling i raised my hand and began to wave to it. at this point it flared up to roughly the size of a full moon, i couldn't tell if it was a beam directed at me or what because i almost fell down in fear. i still get that feeling right now as i write this. nothing else came about, it moved off as silently and slowly as it came. i won't go into more detail here, but there is more to tell, and show if you want to check this out. i can promise within a few hours or days, i can show anyone what i'm talking about.
content.summary: I see these almost every night, the most signifigant of them was slow moving and when i gestured to it, it seemed to respond maybe 1000 ft above me

content.detailedDescription:
Alrighty i finally heard back from a couple of friends who have experience with unusual pictures/videos and unidentified objects... my good friend from mit has been dissecting my photos for the past 5 days and he can't find any reason for the object in my pictures so there for it will be unexplained. he has stated that the object is not lint nor any foreign object on my sensor or lens in-fact my lens had spots on it (not a pro) that actually helped identify that the object was far away from the camera in point of fact . my other good friend from asu has ran the object through a known sightings and ufo image database and has found no matches or similarities of photographed phenomenon. he also explained to me that since i'm not looking for any publicity or monetary gain that it would be fine to post slideshows of the images. he made it clear to me to disclose that i am not a professional photographer and the photos i took are just photos of a object that is in a curious contrast to current known aircraft and weather phenomenon. 

the basics of when where and why. it was sunday may 18, 2014 5:05am. rocky peak road exit 118w. facing east dawn view of the sky over san fernando/simi valley area. i was on my way to camarillo to do some work at my mothers home. i habitually leave early way before any traffic and just so happened to stop at rocky peak... my dog was whining and looked anxious like he was about to wet my back seat. i exited the 118 let my dog relieve himself and noticed it was right on time for some pictures of the sunrise. grabbed my camera (nikon d7000) from the trunk put on a wide angle lens (sigma 10-20mm f4-5.6) and proceeded to snap a few pictures. this was the last thing i ever would have expected to catch on camera. please bear with camera skills i got nervous while taking the photos. i switched to a zoom lens (nikon 70-300mm f4.5-5.6) after i couldn't figure out what was in the picture then right before my eyes... to nervous and fidgety to set my camera well but still snapped all the pictures i could before the morning sun got too bright to focus on the object. as i was staring into the sunrise 3 male hikers asked me if i was taking pictures of the dawn sky..? then one of the hikers said under a breath "did you see the strange "scaffold" in the sky? we had observed it as we parked our car?" the hikers vehicle is photographed early in the sequence... this is all the info i have on this subject. but if you have seen this object please drop me a message i just would like to know... that besides me and the other 3 individuals we're not alone in seeing this amazing sight!
content.summary: Photographed 78 sequenced photos from slr 2 lenses very strange object floating in clouds before sunrise
